Params[3]: Noan was trying to get help from a base that day like he is now, but...
Further involvement will only put this base at risk. Selling you guys weapons is as far as we go.
Captain Rachel tried to get help from many bases as well, but most of them could barely take care of themselves.
Did something happen to Bella's camp? Why is she inside the Red Tide now?
Sorry, but the people in Medical Center 09 are still waiting for me.
He knows he cannot stay here for his past. Despite the many questions he wishes to find the answers to within the Red Tide, he has to leave now.
When did he stop calling her "Bethe"? Noan does not have time to think about it.
He just calls her the way he is familiar with before he hurries away, heading toward the nearby base.
